title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Motor
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Motor 
Insurance) (Exclusion of Certain Contributions to the Insurance Compensation 
Fund and the Motor Insurers Insolvency Compensation Fund) Regulations
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (motor insurance) (exclusion certain contribution insurance compensation fund motor insurer insolvency compensation fund) regulation

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 23 December 2023.
text_raw: 2. These Regulations shall come into operation on 23 December 2023.

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 3. The Insurance Act 1964 (No. 18 of 1964) is amended -
text_raw:
3. The Insurance Act 1964 (No. 18 of 1964) is amended - 

(a) 

in section 3F - 

(i) 

in subsection (5), by the substitution of “Subject to 
subsection (7), in this section” for “In this section”, and 

(ii) by 

the 

insertion of 

the following subsection after 

subsection (6): 

“(7) With effect from 23 December 2023, 
the 
reference to gross premiums in the definition in subsection 
(5) of ‘assessable amount’ shall not include the gross 
premiums paid to a vehicle insurer authorised in another 
Member State in respect of cover provided by it for risk in 
the State classified under class 10 in Part 1 of Schedule 1 
to the European Union (Insurance and Reinsurance) 
Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 485 of 2015).”, 

and 

(b) 

in section 6, by the insertion of the following subsection after 
subsection (14): 

“(15) With effect from 23 December 2023, the references to 
gross premiums in this section shall not include the gross 
premiums paid to a vehicle insurer authorised in another 

1 OJ No, L263, 7.10.2009, p.11 
2 OJ No. L430, 2.12.2021, p.1 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 22nd December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [658] 3 

Member State in respect of cover provided by it for risk 
classified under class 10 in Part 1 of Schedule 1 to the European 
Union (Insurance and Reinsurance) Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 
485 of 2015).”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 December, 2023. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [658]
